title: Harvard Study Confirms Tibetan Monks Can Raise Body Temperature With Their Minds
subtitle: A 1982 study of Tibetan practitioners of "g-tummo" yoga did indeed demonstrate their ability to raise the temperature of different parts of their body.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: A Harvard Study showed that Tibetan Monks can significantly raise the temperature of their fingers, toes and other extremities through meditation alone.
